data.title: Independent Artist Group
data.meta_description: IAG is a globally recognized leader in full-service talent representation and brand management in Los Angeles, New York and Nashville.
data.text:
A market leader distinguished by a unique business model that promotes unparalleled teamwork and a premiere level of packaging and staffing services across all genres of unscripted content, IAG’s Alternative + Factual Programming department represents the creative and business interests of award-winning production companies, producers, directors and branded personalities.

IAG’s Brand Partnerships division connects our clients with global brands through authentic, high-profile activations which generate excitement, influence and awareness both for our clients and the brands they represent throughout the world. The department supports a variety of advertising activations that range from all forms of TV & Video commercials, digital content, social media, public relations partnerships and public appearances.

Our Comedy department represents some of the industry’s most successful, influential and award-winning comedians and storytellers that perform in both venues large and intimate including arenas, theatres, performing arts centers, colleges, festivals and clubs throughout the world.

Representing artists across all genres of the live music experience, from legendary artists to the hottest emerging acts, our Global Touring department represents a diverse and highly respected roster of in-demand talent on a Worldwide basis.

Our Media Rights Group department turns the incredible storytelling of our Best Selling and highly influential authors, writers, journalists, and publishers into some of the most popular, successful, and well-respected feature films, made for television & streaming movies and series across all worldwide platforms.

Our Physical Production Department represents world class producers, artisans, and specialists behind the camera who are essential contributors in creating the magic seen on all screens big and small. Proudly featuring global representation of producers, first & second unit directors, editors, production designers, art directors, set designers, cinematographers, costume designers, visual and special effects supervisors, stunt coordinators, hair & make-up artists, digital creative designers, studio and production services.

Be it film, television, streaming or short-form content, everything begins with the written word. Our Scripted Literary department effectively nurtures, navigates and builds the careers of some of the most accomplished and successful writers, producers, directors, creators and showrunners in the entertainment industry.

Our Speakers department connects some of the world’s most accomplished, and inspiring voices to rooms large and small creating once in a lifetime experiences that captivate, enlighten and entertain their audiences.

We represent some of the worlds most respected and acclaimed actors, many of whom are recent Academy Award, Emmy, Tony, SAG and Golden Globe Award winners. Their ability to articulate and express the human condition in its most dramatic and humous states captivates, inspires and entertains global audiences.

Our Theater department represents some of the most vibrant playwrights, composers, directors, choreographers, dramaturgs and designers in the industry. With a focus on personalized attention to artists and advocacy to a wider creative community, we also work with each client on diverse pathways of opportunity to expand their careers in podcasts, books, television, film, streaming and other platforms.
